content: Something I realized when I encountered the question " Please indicate how vital to your workflow each of the following tools are when programming with Rust": I almost never run rustdoc or cargo doc directly myself, but despite that, those tools are absolutely critical to my workflow, insofar as I look up documentation all the time.
I'm hoping that people answer the question on the latter basis, rather than the former.
Perhaps we should have included docs.rs in that answer...
I answered the question as though docs.rs was a reason why rustdoc is essential, but I can imagine some people saying "well, I don't run rustdoc directly myself..."
